); }; export default LoginPage; export async function action({ request }) { const formData = await request.formData(); const email = formData.get("email"); const pass = formData.get("password"); console.log(request.method); const userData = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/auth/login", { method: request.method, headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, credentials: "include", body: JSON.stringify({ email: email, password: pass }), }); const loginInfo = await userData.json(); console.log(loginInfo); return redirect("/product"); }
